amendatorysection.para: The commission shall file an annual report with the Governor and the Clerk of the Legislature, prior to each regular session of the Legislature, which details the activities and expenditures of the commission and shall include separately information related to the activities and expenditures of the vending facility program as well as estimates of anticipated expenditures and anticipated revenue available to the vending facility program from all sources. The report submitted to the Clerk of the Legislature shall be submitted electronically.
